import React, { useContext } from 'react' import ThemeContext from '../../../context/ThemeContext' import LanguageContext from '../../../context/LanguageContext' import AuthContext from '../../../context/AuthContext' const HeaderContext = () => { const { theme, handleTheme } = useContext(ThemeContext) const { texts, handleLanguage } = useContext(LanguageContext) const { auth, handleAuth } = useContext(AuthContext) let { headerTitleContext, headerSubtitle, selectLabel, headerLight, headerDark, buttonLogin, buttonLogout, } = texts return (

{headerTitleContext}

{headerSubtitle}

) } export default HeaderContext
